This message is automatically generated.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12904225 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

The failures are not related.
The checkstyle error will be fixed here: HIVE-18356

A couple of comments in the build method:
# It should only set the owner if owner hasn't already been set.  As it is now it will override any owner the set in setOwner.
# Why the double try blocks, with the outer one catching all exceptions?  The outer block can be removed.  If there are any uncaught exceptions as a result, they should be caught and converted to MetaException in the inner block as IOException is.

Thanks for catching this [~alangates].
Last minute change to be more similar to the other builders went awry :(
